annonstext:
About Graniten

Graniten is a global provider of machine solutions to the pharmaceutical manufacturing and healthcare automation sector. We have built turn-key solutions since 1992 and today we offer products ranging all the way from custom innovations to full-scale production equipment. Global pharmaceutical companies and healthcare suppliers are the testimony to our exceptional service. At Graniten, our core purpose is to empower our customers and help them improve their production and workflow to continuously improve patient care and security. Our core values of Partnership, Passion and Teamwork, Innovation, Ownership, Continuous Improvement – these values speak to who we are and what we believe. If this sounds like the kind of team you’d like to be part of apply today and let’s work together for a bright future.



Electrical design engineer
We are looking for an individual with experience in industrial electrical design for controls and automation.

In this role you will be executing the electrical design work in our project teams. You will work close together with the System engineer and the Automation lead engineer to deliver projects according to specifications and with correct quality. The role will have the responsibility to develop and maintain current methods of electrical design development at Graniten. The main tool for developing is e-plan electric P8.

Background and Skills 
To be successful in this role, we want you to have a clear drive and experience of product development. You need to have a good understanding of technology and processes for efficient product development. Your background is from product development that includes electrical design of automation and controls projects and have experience with electrical schematics, control panel design, and cable dimensioning. You have also broad knowledge within automation components, such as PLCs, servo motor, sensors etc. We are in the forefront of PLC, robotics and HMI programming and are using Beckhoff, ABB and COPA data as some of our system suppliers. Sensors, servo motors and pneumatics are used to perform functions. It is therefore meritorious if you have experience working with one or several of these technical areas and incorporated them in electrical schematics.

Responsibilities

 - In dialog with System engineer and Automation lead engineer, act to secure quality accuracy
 - Is responsible for the quality of the individual deliverables in Graniten’s projects
 - Be the technical expert in electrical design
 - Execute tasks in projects
 - Technical documentation
 - Electrical schematics
 - System analysis
 - I/O lists
 - Understand and interpret requirements
 - Use Graniten’s standards and best practice
 - Maintain electrical design best practice
 - Responsible for interface documents
 - Control panel design
 - Cable dimensioning

Personal qualification

 - Bachelor’s degree in electrical engineering
 - Minimum 3 Years’ experience within product development
 - Demonstrated ability to work in teams and manage multiple tasks and objectives
 - Broad knowledge with electrical design technology
 - Problem-solving and client service orientation
 - Good communication skills, both verbal and written to communicate effectively with internal team members and external clients
 - Team player who embraces responsibility and wants to be part of a winning team

Employment Type

Full-time

Contact

For more information about the position, contact FIRSTNAME LASTNAME, Engineering director +46- TELEPHONENO ,  EMAIL 

GRANITEN ENGINEERING AB

Kärrastrandvägen 125A

451 76  Uddevalla

We welcome your application as soon as possible, selection is done continuously.
